thread.title: Leah

author: Leah
title: Leah
text:
I purchased this as a Christmas present for my boyfriend who like to smoke but wanted to cut down.
This has been the perfect present for him.
It heats up quickly, tastes amazing (I've tried it myself with various herbs)
Is a small and gender neutral design, easy to use and clean.
It was delivered VERY quickly, the packing is minimal and overall I was very impressed with the service of this website.
Thanks, highly recommend this product and website.
